@graph.name: Defocus and Volta potential phase plate cryo-electron tomography of S. pombe cryo-FIB lamellae with comprehensive annotations of structures and macromolecules

@graph.description: S. pombe K972 Sp h- wild-type haploid cells.
@graph.name: _:S. pombe wild-type cells

@graph.description: Milled lamellae were loaded into a Titan Krios (Thermo Fisher Scientific) such that the axis of the pre-tilt introduced by FIB milling was aligned perpendicular to the tilt axis of the microscope. Tomograms were acquired on a K2 Summit direct detection camera (Gatan) operating in dose fractionation mode utilizing a Quantum post-column energy filter operated at zero-loss (Gatan). A calibrated pixel size of 3.37 Å was used. Up to 14 tilt series were collected on a single lamella in low dose mode using SerialEM. Starting from the lamella pre-tilt, images were acquired in 2° increments within a range of +58° to −40° using a dose-symmetric tilt scheme with a constant electron dose per tilt image. For ground truth data, a set of ten tilt series were collected with a 70 μm objective aperture.
@graph.labEquipment: Titan Krios (Thermo Fisher Scientific) microscope with K2 Summit direct detection camera (Gatan) operating in dose fractionation mode utilizing a Quantum post-column energy filter operated at zero-loss (Gatan).
@graph.name: Cryo-electron tomography, defocus only

@graph.description: Milled lamellae were loaded into a Titan Krios (Thermo Fisher Scientific) such that the axis of the pre-tilt introduced by FIB milling was aligned perpendicular to the tilt axis of the microscope. Tomograms were acquired on a K2 Summit direct detection camera (Gatan) operating in dose fractionation mode utilizing a Quantum post-column energy filter operated at zero-loss (Gatan). A calibrated pixel size of 3.37 Å was used. Up to 14 tilt series were collected on a single lamella in low dose mode using SerialEM. Starting from the lamella pre-tilt, images were acquired in 2° increments within a range of +58° to −40° using a dose-symmetric tilt scheme with a constant electron dose per tilt image. For ground truth data, a set of ten tilt series were collected with a VPP56 (Thermo Fisher Scientific) with prior conditioning for 5 min.
@graph.labEquipment: Titan Krios (Thermo Fisher Scientific) microscope with K2 Summit direct detection camera (Gatan) operating in dose fractionation mode utilizing a Quantum post-column energy filter operated at zero-loss (Gatan).
@graph.name: Cryo-electron tomography, defocus and Volta phase plate
